SEARCH
Package RaccoonRush.game.menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
RaccoonRush.game.menu.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameManager
public class Menu extends Object implements GameManager
Class for the Menu, responsible for the main menu, settings menu, and gameover menu. The menu does not run while the game is actively being played.
